tit.cmt: 原文には「土師娑婆連」 とありますが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「土師猪手」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出しました。

sen.j: 土師猪手（はじ の いのて、生年不詳 - 皇極天皇2年（643年）？）は姓は連（むらじ）。
sen.e: Kabane (hereditary title) of HAJI no Inote (year of birth unknown - 643?) was Muraji.
HAJI no Inote was a woman (the year of birth unknown - 643?) whose Kabane (hereditary title) was Muraji.
HAJI no Inote was a woman (the year of birth unknown - 643?) whose Kabane (hereditary title) was Muraji.
He was ranked 'Dainin' (the third grade of "twelve grades of cap rank") in Kani junikai (twelve grades of cap rank).
He was given the title Dainin (the third grade of twelve grades of cap rank) in "Kani junikai" (twelve grades of cap rank).
sen.cmt: 自然な語句に訂正しました。
sen.e: She was given the title Dainin (the third grade of twelve grades of cap rank) in "Kani junikai" (twelve grades of cap rank).

sen.j: 通称土師娑婆（はじ の さば）。
sen.e: He was commonly known as HAJI no Saba.
He called himself HAJI no Saba.
sen.cmt: 自然な表現に訂正しました。
sen.e: She called herself HAJI no Saba.
His father was HAJI no Iware.
His father was HAJI no Iware.
Her father was HAJI no Iware.

sen.j: 推古天皇11年（603年）、征新羅大将軍：来目皇子の葬儀を周防国で行っている。
sen.e: He conducted the funeral ceremony of Prince Kume, the Shilla-conquering Generalissimo, in Suo Province in 603.
sen.cmt: 「征新羅大将軍」定訳不明ですが、"the Shilla-conquering Generalissimo"としました。
sen.e: He was in charge of the funeral of Prince Kume, which was held in Suo Province in 603; The prince was Daishogun(command in chief) who had conquered Shilla.
sen.cmt: 自然な表現に訂正しました。
sen.e: She was in charge of the funeral of Prince Kume, which was held in Suo Province in 603; The prince was Daishogun (command in chief) who had conquered Shilla.

sen.j: 周防国佐波に来目皇子の殯宮を造ったので、娑婆と名乗るようになった。
sen.e: Because he built arakinomiya (mortuary) for Prince Kume in Saba, Suo Province, he came to call himself Saba.
Because he built arakinomiya (mortuary) for Prince Kume in Saba, Suo Province, he came to call himself Saba.
Because she built a mortuary for Prince Kume in Saba, Suo Province, she came to call herself Saba.

sen.j: 皇極天皇2年（643年）、皇極天皇の生母である吉備嶋皇祖母命（吉備姫王）が薨去し、天皇の詔によって吉備姫王の葬儀執行を担当する。
sen.e: When Kibinoshima no sumemioya no mikoto (Kibitsuhime Okimi), Empress Kogyoku's biological mother, died in 643, he conducted Kibitsuhime Okimi's funeral ceremony by the Imperial edict.

When KIBINOSHIMA no Suenomiya no mikoto (Kibitsuhime Okimi), who was the Empress Kogyoku's biological mother, died in 643, he was in charge of the funeral for Kibitsuhime Okimi by the emperor's order.
sen.cmt: 語句の誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: When KIBINOSHIMA no Suenomiya no mikoto (Kibitsuhime Okimi), who was the Empress Kogyoku's biological mother, died in 643, she was in charge of the funeral for Kibitsuhime Okimi by the emperor's order.

sen.j: しかしその年の12月、上宮王家襲撃事件で巨勢徳太に従い、100の兵で斑鳩宮を攻めるが奴三成に討たれ、戦死する。
sen.e: However, in December of the same year when he attacked Ikaruganomiya Palace with 100 troops following KOSE no Tokoda in the Jogu Oke Attack, he was killed by a slave Minari in the battle.

In December of the year, following KOSE no Tokoda, he attacked Ikaruganomiya Palace with 100 troops on the attack at the Jogu Oke family; Nevertheless, he was killed by a slave Minari during the battle.
sen.cmt: 語句の誤りにつき、訂正しました。
sen.e: At the incident of the attack on the Jogu Oke family in December of the same year, although she attacked Ikaruganomiya Palace with 100 troops following KOSE no Tokoda, she was killed by a slave Minari during the battle.
sen.cmt: Sheに変更し、内容を変更しました。
